name: 'The Attendant'
description:
Flight 155’s landing gear has jammed and it's stuck in limbo, burning fuel ahead of an emergency landing. As flight attendant Evie, you can learn about your passengers, and about yourself, as you ease their fears during the crisis.

--

Hey, thanks so much for checking out 'The Attendant'. Each and every play, rating and piece of feedback is very much appreciated. The game should take around 20-25minutes max to complete. I'd recommend playing in full-screen!

You can support me and my work here, check out my website here, and follow me on Twitter here.
